cn.uc.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output
类 MultipleTextOutputFormat<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<K,V>
      org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.FileOutputFormat<K,V>
          cn.uc.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.MultipleTextOutputFormat<K,V>

public class MultipleTextOutputFormat<K,V>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.FileOutputFormat<K,V>

多输出类。 本类仅测试过以key为文件名时是安全的（并且要求相同的Key必须落在同JVM中），其它的使用方式可能存在问题。

作者：
zhaigy

getBaseRecordWriter

protected org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordWriter<K,V> getBaseRecordWriter(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext job,
                                                                            String name)
                                                                     throws IOException,
                                                                            InterruptedException
参数：
job - a job conf object
name - the name of the file over which a record writer object will be constructed
返回：
A RecordWriter object over the given file
抛出：
IOException
InterruptedException

generateActualKey

protected K generateActualKey(K key,
                              V value)
Generate the actual key from the given key/value. The default behavior is that the actual key is equal to the given key

参数：
key - the key of the output data
value - the value of the output data
返回：
the actual key derived from the given key/value

generateActualValue

protected V generateActualValue(K key,
                                V value)
Generate the actual value from the given key and value. The default behavior is that the actual value is equal to the given value

参数：
key - the key of the output data
value - the value of the output data
返回：
the actual value derived from the given key/value

generateFileNameForKeyValue

protected String generateFileNameForKeyValue(K key,
                                             V value,
                                             String name)
Generate the file output file name based on the given key and the leaf file name. The default behavior is that the file name does not depend on the key.

参数：
key - the key of the output data
name - the leaf file name
返回：
generated file name

generateLeafFileName

protected String generateLeafFileName(String name)
Generate the leaf name for the output file name. The default behavior does not change the leaf file name (such as part-00000)

参数：
name - the leaf file name for the output file
返回：
the given leaf file name

getInputFileBasedOutputFileName

protected String getInputFileBasedOutputFileName(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration job,
                                                 String name)
Generate the outfile name based on a given name and the input file name. If the map input file does not exists (i.e. this is not for a map only job), the given name is returned unchanged. If the config value for "num.of.trailing.legs.to.use" is not set, or set 0 or negative, the given name is returned unchanged. Otherwise, return a file name consisting of the N trailing legs of the input file name where N is the config value for "num.of.trailing.legs.to.use".

参数：
job - the job config
name - the output file name
返回：
the outfile name based on a given anme and the input file name.

getRecordWriter

public org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordWriter<K,V> getRecordWriter(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext job)
                                                              throws IOException
Create a composite record writer that can write key/value data to different output files

指定者：
类 org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.FileOutputFormat<K,V> 中的 getRecordWriter
参数：
fs - the file system to use
job - the job conf for the job
name - the leaf file name for the output file (such as part-00000")
arg3 - a progressable for reporting progress.
返回：
a composite record writer
抛出：
IOException
